key_events.name: Acceptance Notification
key_events.description: Selected startups receive official acceptance and program details.

key_events.name: Onboarding Documentation
key_events.description: Founders complete administrative, legal, and program onboarding steps.

key_events.name: Pre-Program Survey
key_events.description: Founders share goals, challenges, and expectations to tailor support.

key_events.name: Program Kickoff Day
key_events.description: Official launch of the cohort with introductions and program overview.

key_events.name: Founder Introductions & Pitches
key_events.description: Each startup presents its vision, problem, and current stage.

key_events.name: Goal-Setting Workshop
key_events.description: Founders define measurable goals for the duration of the accelerator.

key_events.name: Customer Discovery Sprint
key_events.description: Founders conduct structured interviews and market research.

key_events.name: Market & ICP Workshop
key_events.description: Deep dive into target users, ICP definition, and segmentation.

key_events.name: Weekly Progress Review
key_events.description: Check-in with coaches to review learnings and blockers.

objectives: Build and iterate on the product

key_events.name: Product Sprint
key_events.description: Focused development period to build or refine the core product.

key_events.name: Product Review Session
key_events.description: Founders demo progress and receive feedback from mentors.

key_events.name: UX & Value Proposition Workshop
key_events.description: Refine messaging, positioning, and user experience.

key_events.name: Go-To-Market Strategy Workshop
key_events.description: Design initial sales, marketing, and distribution strategies.

key_events.name: Growth Experiment Sprint
key_events.description: Founders run small-scale growth or revenue experiments.

key_events.name: Fundraising Readiness Workshop
key_events.description: Covers pitch decks, metrics, and investor expectations.

key_events.name: Pitch Practice Sessions
key_events.description: Founders rehearse and refine their pitches with feedback.

key_events.name: Demo Day
key_events.description: Startups present to investors, partners, and the ecosystem.

key_events.name: Program Retrospective
key_events.description: Founders reflect on learnings and provide feedback on the program.
